name: Blast Shield
description: Innate: Hitting an enemy with an ability grants Vi a  shield equal to  15% of her maximum health for 3 seconds.
descriptions: Innate: Hitting an enemy with an ability grants Vi a  shield equal to  15% of her maximum health for 3 seconds.
Blast Shield's  cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds for every trigger of  Denting Blows.

name: Vault Breaker
description: Active: Vi  charges for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's  range, speed, and damage while being  slowed by 15%. Vault Breaker can be recast at any time within its duration.
leveling: Minimum Physical Damage:»55 / 80 / 105 / 130 / 155 (+ 70% bonus AD)«Maximum Damage:110 / 160 / 210 / 260 / 310 (+ 140% bonus AD)
levelings: Minimum Physical Damage:»55 / 80 / 105 / 130 / 155 (+ 70% bonus AD)«Maximum Damage:110 / 160 / 210 / 260 / 310 (+ 140% bonus AD)
descriptions: Active: Vi  charges for up to 4 seconds to increase Vault Breaker's  range, speed, and damage while being  slowed by 15%. Vault Breaker can be recast at any time within its duration.
If the charge completes without reactivation, Vault Breaker is canceled and goes on full cooldown.
Recast: Vi  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies she passes through, increased by 0% − 100% (based on channel time).
Vi stops upon colliding with an enemy champion,  knocking them back while non-champion enemies in her path are instead  pulled towards her.
Vault Breaker will go on a 3-second  cooldown if the charge is canceled.

name: Denting Blows
description: Passive: Vi's basic attacks on-hit and  Vault Breaker apply Denting Blows to enemies hit, stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, Vi consumes them to deal bonus physical damage and  reduce the target's armor by 20%, with the bonus damage capped at 300 against non-champions.
leveling: Bonus Physical Damage:4 / 5.5 / 7 / 8.5 / 10% (+「 1% per 35 」「 2.86% per 100 」bonus AD) of target's maximum health
levelings: Bonus Physical Damage:4 / 5.5 / 7 / 8.5 / 10% (+「 1% per 35 」「 2.86% per 100 」bonus AD) of target's maximum health
descriptions: Passive: Vi's basic attacks on-hit and  Vault Breaker apply Denting Blows to enemies hit, stacking up to 3 times. At 3 stacks, Vi consumes them to deal bonus physical damage and  reduce the target's armor by 20%, with the bonus damage capped at 300 against non-champions.
After triggering Denting Blows, Vi gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent triggers.
The debuff is applied after the damage has been dealt.

name: Excessive Force
description: Passive: Vi periodically stores up to 2 Excessive Force charges.
descriptions: Passive: Vi periodically stores up to 2 Excessive Force charges.

Active: Vi's next basic attack becomes  unstoppable, gains  50 bonus range and deals physical damage to all enemies in a cone in front of her. The damage can  critically strike for (100% +  25%) AD bonus physical damage.
Excessive Force  resets Vi's basic attack timer.
Excessive Force only affects  structures if they're the primary target.

name: Assault and Battery
description: Active: Vi  reveals the target enemy  champion and  dashes with  displacement immunity towards them, dealing physical damage and  knocking them up for 1.25 seconds upon arrival.
descriptions: Active: Vi  reveals the target enemy  champion and  dashes with  displacement immunity towards them, dealing physical damage and  knocking them up for 1.25 seconds upon arrival.
Enemies along the way are dealt the same damage,  knocked aside by 350 units over 0.25 seconds, and simultaneously  stunned for 0.75 seconds.
